WHE=
ELIE was not particularly well versed over in the intricacies of Predacon a=
nd Maximal politics, but even he had heard a glistening of the dread MAGMAT=
RON.

Walking along with the three, he nodded, "Perhaps, that is the way I =
shall go.  As they say, the more I shall know." 

Walking along< "And I am =
sorry you came from Magmatron.  He is a terror that let much on.  I must ap=
ologize for what he made you this day, I am thankful you were able to get a=
way."

Walking along wtih them towards the mysterious unit that they had me=

uld be filed away in his processor, as soon as he was out of this strange n=
ull zone of communications to be broadcast back to the Maximal command staf=
